mean_cn: v.崇拜，爱戴；做礼拜，拜神；  n.礼拜，礼拜仪式
mean_en: to show respect for God or a god, especially by saying prayers, singing, etc. with other people in a religious building; to love and admire somebody very much, especially so much that you cannot see their faults
sentence: In ancient times, Chinese farmers used to worship the god of earth.
sentence_trans: 在古代，中国农民敬拜土地公公。
